name: Haunted Floating Eye - Lair Defense
description:
Rated Best New Game In Better Caves and Lairs Magazine

Every 100 years, when the Ancient Spider gazes into a mirror, a Haunted Floating Eye is born... this time it's you.

Use your DESTROY-O RAY to shape a naturally occurring (randomly-generated with each new game) cave formation into your new lair- but beware! Conspiracies abound against you, and whole parties of adventurers seek your treasure and your eye stalks for their trophy room...

Play as one of three different Haunted Floating Eyes, with four unique central eye types: Eye of the Spider, Eye of the Goat, Eye of the Fool, Eye of the Tiger.

Petrify your foes using the MEDUSA BEAM, and use them to decorate your cave lair, collect their treasures and set traps for the next lot.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

1,2,3 keys to choose primary action

Left mouse button: Use primary action

Credits:

I didn't make EVERYTHING for this from scratch, but damn near all of it. The font is from  stuffbyspencer's Fonts N Goblins pack. It really ties the room together. I also made use of the Jumper pathfinding library. I'm bad at math.

Haunted Floating Eye was created as part of LÖVE Jam 2018 and is in active development
